name: nativescript-danem-google-maps-utils
description: A NativeScript Goole maps utils for IOS & Android.

scripts.demo-ios: grunt build && cd demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo-android: grunt build && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.demo-ng-ios: grunt build && cd demo-ng && tns run ios
scripts.demo-ng-android: grunt build && cd demo-ng && tns run android
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build
scripts.release:post: git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): New release version' && npm run git-tag && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:major: npm run release:pre && npm version major && npm run release:post
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:pre && npm version minor && npm run release:post
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:pre && npm version patch && npm run release:post
scripts.merge-and-publish:pre: git checkout master && git merge develop && mkdir package
scripts.merge-and-publish: cd package && mv ../README.md . && mv ../LICENSE . && npm publish && git reset --hard && git clean -f

author: Jean-Marc Chemama <j.chemama.danem@gmail.com>
